events.message: I received my order two weeks ago, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The customer's request to return the product and get their money back has been identified and categorized as a refund case.
Support agent Sara Thompson has been assigned to handle the refund case initiated by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you would like to return your product and request a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know the reason for the return so we can process your refund efficiently?
Sure, my order number is #457829, and the reason for return is the product did not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return shipping label has been sent to the customerâ€™s email, and the refund process will start once the product is returned.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and have mailed the product back. Thanks again for your support!
The refund has been processed successfully and the amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
We have closed your refund case. Please reach out if you have any further questions or need assistance in the future.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback to help us improve our service.
